problems.title: Create Array of Squares
problems.description:
Create a new array where each element is the square of the corresponding element in the original array. Print the new array with space-separated values.

Input Format:
First line contains n, the size of array.
Second line contains n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print the new array with squares, space-separated.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
4
1 2 3 4

Sample Output
1 4 9 16

Explanation:
Squares: 1² = 1, 2² = 4, 3² = 9, 4² = 16
hintsList: Use newArr[i] = arr[i] * arr[i] in a loop.
